title: LaCo0.2Fe0.8O3 perovskites doped with natural Ca2+ as bifunctional electrocatalysts for oxygen evolution and reduction reactions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27488-27503
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04105D, Paper
Open Access

Islam Saad, S. I. El-Dek, M. F. Eissa, Loïc Assaud, Rafat M. Amin
Perovskite oxides are promising electrocatalysts for various energy applications due to their exceptional catalytic activity, flexible architecture, and low cost.
